level.text: The Mayor shall submit to the Council by September 30 of each year, beginning in 2009, an annual report on the status of pre-k for all sectors, accompanied, in 2009, by the independent quality evaluation required by ยง 38-271.03, which shall include OSSE's assessment of the:
Annual achievements made as measured against the benchmarks developed the previous year;
Number and success of the quality improvement plans implemented;
Status of the monitoring, assessment, and accountability processes for all programs within the pre-k-education system; and
Results of the current capacity audit of all pre-k programs.

For the 2009 report, for which benchmarks would not have been submitted in the prior year, the annual achievements shall be measured using existing reliable data and that data shall be included, or an abstract thereof, in the evaluation.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 38-271.07.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-202
level.text: For Law 17-202, see notes following ยง 38-271.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority pursuant to Section 501 of the Pre-k Enhancement and Expansion Amendment Act of 2008, see Mayor's Order 2009-44, March 27, 2009 (56 DCR 6872).
